meanings.definition: Slightly smaller in size than something else.
meanings.sent1: The toy car was teensier than the real car.
meanings.sent2: The kitten was teensier than the puppy.
meanings.sent3: The teensier cupcake was gone in a single bite!
meanings.sent4: Her teensier voice was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The teensier stars twinkled in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The flower in the teensier pot bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The teensier box fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent3: His teensier hat kept flying off in the wind!
meanings.sent4: The teensier problem seemed huge to the little girl.
meanings.sent5: The teensier pebbles made a crunchy sound underfoot.
